## UnionTypeSchema interface

TypeScript Union Types, like `A | B`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface UnionTypeSchema 
```

## Example


```ts
type X1 = A | B;
type X2 = A | null | undefined;
type Gender = 'Male' | 'Female';

```
